com.foreach.across.core.database

Class SchemaConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.core.database.SchemaConfiguration

  • public class SchemaConfiguration
extends Object
    Class encapsulating general database properties to be used when creating/updating the schema. With specific functionality for table names and renaming tables.
